tooltip.image: Tap to view a quick description of the item.
tooltip.supply: Number of times this item was sold in the selected period.
tooltip.value: Total HCASH volume generated by this item.

tokenomics.title: HASH Allocation
tokenomics.name: Token Name
tokenomics.capDetail: 9% annually (90M), decreasing each year. Unused portion rolls over as backup for next year.

about_hcash.hcash_description: $HCASH is the core currency of the project‚Äîfully powered by players, backed by multi-strategy mechanics. With a carefully planned allocation spanning over 10 years, $HCASH becomes a valuable and exclusive asset: a true luxury within the ecosystem.
about_hcash.max_supply_desc: Comparison between total projected supply and the current active supply (on-chain and in-game combined)
about_hcash.tokens_mined_desc: $HCASH earned by players as mining rewards ‚Äî split each block according to player activity and performance
about_hcash.tokens_spent_desc: Total $HCASH reinvested by players through upgrades, store purchases, and in-game features
about_hcash.tokens_ingame_desc: In-game circulating $HCASH ‚Äî held by players but not yet minted on the blockchain
about_hcash.tokens_onchain_desc: On-chain circulating $HCASH ‚Äî includes player wallets, DEX liquidity, and the main contract balance (used for withdrawals and holding user deposits)
about_hcash.holders_desc: Number of wallets currently holding $HCASH on-chain
about_hcash.transactions_desc: Total number of transactions involving $HCASH on the blockchain
about_hcash.volume_desc: Amount of $HCASH traded on-chain, including liquidity pools and direct swaps

hub_carousel.description: Our app centralizes powerful features to enhance user convenience and provide an immersive experience.

self_economy.title: Web3 Self-Economy
self_economy.subtitle: Simple, earn $HCASH tokens playing games
self_economy.final_description: Combining Faucet and Peer-to-Peer mechanics, we've built a dynamic, player-driven economy. Over 80% of in-game items are consumables, vanishing after use, which helps decrease the circulating supply. The rest are non-consumables with a very limited quantity, ensuring they remain valuable and exclusive.

trending.title: Trending Assets Cap
trending.description: Track the top Hunter assets in real time with live statistics and performance metrics.

what_we_are_building.title: What We Are Building?
what_we_are_building.paragraph_1: We are engineering the Space Hunters Ecosystem ‚Äî a fully immersive, interoperable gaming metaverse powered by blockchain and player ambition.
what_we_are_building.paragraph_2: The Web Hub App connects everything ‚Äî track progress, participate in live events, manage NFTs, engage with the community, and unlock future features like collectibles, staking tools, and social systems.

why_join.description: Join the SH universe! Register now for an immersive gaming experience, dive into thrilling adventures, have fun, and earn $HCASH coins to fuel your journey!

benefits.title: Access
benefits.description: Dive into addictive mid-core games in the SH universe! Join now to experience thrilling gameplay and check your progress anytime.

benefits.title: Explore
benefits.description: Unlock unlimited benefits with our memberships! Enjoy double $HCASH earnings, extra gameplay, exclusive rewards, and more.

benefits.title: Real
benefits.description: Join a vibrant SH universe community! Connect with gamers, share strategies, and earn free $HCASH rewards 24/7.

benefits.title: Long-Term
benefits.description: Experience a unique Web3 economy! Over 70% of $HCASH tokens burned daily, ensuring a sustainable and rewarding tokenomic system.

ecosystem.title: What We Are Building?
ecosystem.description: We are engineering the Space Hunters Ecosystem ‚Äî a fully immersive, interoperable gaming metaverse powered by blockchain and player ambition.
ecosystem.tech_generators: It includes Tech Generators, a resource-management game where players optimize energy, hire engineers, and upgrade mining operations to earn real rewards.
ecosystem.economy: Our economy runs on $HCASH and $HCREDIT, allowing for staking, enhancements, in-game purchases, and trading.
ecosystem.webhub: The Web Hub App connects everything ‚Äî track progress, participate in live events, manage NFTs, engage with the community, and unlock future features like collectibles, staking tools, and social systems.

tech-generators.title: Tech Generators
tech-generators.description: Tech Generators is a sci-fi mid-core mining game with real-time gameplay, unique mechanics, no direct competitors, and exciting play-to-earn rewards!

chat-adventure.title: Chat Adventure
chat-adventure.description: CHAD is an immersive text-based MMORPG with solo and multiplayer modes. Explore a fantastical world, engage in thrilling PvP battles, hunt epic creatures, become a Creature Master, and more!

space-hunters.title: The Reborn
space-hunters.description: Own NFT Tools, Avatars, Lands, and Boosters to prepare for epic excavations, thrilling mercenary missions, and more in an immersive adventure!
